mapper.update: update account set balance=balance - #{amount} where accountId = #{payAccountId}
update account set balance=balance + #{amount} where accountId = #{recAccountId}
mapper.insert: insert into transaction(transactionNo, payAccountId, recAccountId, transactionTime, transactionAmount, transactionStatus) VALUES(#{transactionNo}, #{payAccountId}, #{recAccountId}, #{transactionTime}, #{transactionAmount}, #{transactionStatus})
